languages.text: Едва Лорд-капитан берется за вокс, как {mf|его|ее} хватает за руку Идира. Глаза псайкера расширены, а взгляд устремлен куда-то в пустоту.
As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
languages.original_text: Едва Лорд-капитан берется за вокс, как {mf|его|ее} хватает за руку Идира. Глаза псайкера расширены, а взгляд устремлен куда-то в пустоту.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.
As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

languages.text: En cuanto {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} sujeta el voco, Idira le sujeta la mano. Tiene los ojos como platos y mira a la nada.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} sujeta el voco, Idira le sujeta la mano. Tiene los ojos como platos y mira a la nada.

languages.text: 领主舰长刚一拿起通讯器，伊迪拉就抓住了{mf|他|她}的手。她的眼睛瞪得大大的，盯着太空。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长刚一拿起通讯器，伊迪拉就抓住了{mf他|她}的手。她的眼睛瞪得大大的，盯着太空。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンがヴォクスを手に取るとすぐ、イディラがその手を掴んだ。彼女の目は大きく開き、宇宙を見つめている。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンがヴォクスを手に取るとすぐ、イディラがその手を掴んだ。彼女の目は大きく開き、宇宙を見つめている。

languages.text: Als der Lord Captain den Hörer abnimmt, ergreift Idira seine Hand. Ihre Augen sind weit aufgerissen, sie starrt ins Leere.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

languages.text: À l'instant où {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prend le vox, Idira lui saisit la main. Ses yeux sont écarquillés et vitreux.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: À l'instant où {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prend le vox, Idira lui saisit la main. Ses yeux sont écarquillés et vitreux.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan voksu kaldırır kaldırmaz İdira onun elini yakalıyor. Kocaman gözleriyle boşluğa bakıyor.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Lord Captain picks up the vox, Idira grabs {mf|his|her} hand. Her eyes are wide, staring off into space.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan voksu kaldırır kaldırmaz İdira elini yakalıyor. Gözleri kocaman, boşluğa bakıyor.
